actions.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 16).
Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Flores to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Flores to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 197 (Roll no. 16).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to provide an additional $33.677 billion in total spending to cover current and anticipated needs in the wake of the devastating Hurricane Sandy. This funding is in addition to the amendment submitted by Chairman Rogers.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment provides an additional $33.677 billion in total spending to cover current and anticipated needs in the wake of Hurricane Sandy. As amended, see item 40 (Fleming amendment) and item 42 (Bishop (UT) amendment).

description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to strike $150,000,000 for Regional Ocean Partnership grants.
purpose: Amendment strikes the $150 million for Regional Ocean Partnership grants.
